pages.text: Pretty much your standard altar, it is a requirement for more advanced forms of magic, such as circle magic, for it powers the ritual. Various items can be placed on the altar. The following are valid: Skulls, Pentacles, Flower Pots, Goblets, Gem Bowls, Torches, Candles, Lanterns, Athames, Bolines, Most Swords, Dragon Eggs, and Golden Apples. The altar also benefits from having plants growing wild near it.

pages.name: How to build
pages.text: The blocks around the altar must $(i)not$() be other altar blocks

pages.name: The altar
pages.text: Any carpet can be used on the altar to form the final structure
